asgn2Customers

Class DroneDeliveryCustomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Customers.Customer
      • asgn2Customers.DroneDeliveryCustomer

  • public class DroneDeliveryCustomer
extends Customer
    A class that represents a customer that has chosen to have their pizza delivered by a drone. This class extends the abstract Customer class and calculates the delivery distance as the Euclidean Distance between the customer and the restaurant. A description of the class's fields and their constraints is provided in Section 5.2 of the Assignment Specification.
    Author:
    PersonB

      This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant that has chosen to have their pizza delivered by a drone.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DroneDeliveryCustomer

        public DroneDeliveryCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String mobileNumber,
                             int locationX,
                             int locationY)
                      throws CustomerException
        This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant that has chosen to have their pizza delivered by a drone. A CustomerException is thrown if the any of the constraints listed in Section 5.2 of the Assignment Specification are violated.

        PRE: TRUE

        POST: All field values are set

        Parameters:
        name - - The Customer's name
        mobileNumber - - The customer mobile number
        locationX - - The customer x location relative to the Pizza Palace Restaurant measured in units of 'blocks'
        locationY - The customer y location relative to the Pizza Palace Restaurant measured in units of 'blocks'
        Throws:
        CustomerException - if supplied parameters are invalid

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryDistance

        public double getDeliveryDistance()
        Returns the Euclidean Distance between the instance of DroneDeliveryCustomer and the restaurant. Overrides getDeliveryDistance() in Customer.
        Specified by:
        getDeliveryDistance in class Customer
        Returns:
        The distance between the restaurant and the customer in Euclidean distance.
